summary_gpt: Force Motors Limited announced its audited financial results for the quarter and year ending March 31, 2025, reporting increased total income and net profit compared to the previous year. The company also published a newspaper advertisement of these results as per SEBI regulations.

Force Motors Limited announced a change in its senior management, with Col. Sushant Shukla ceasing to be a senior management official effective 25th April 2025. The company also provided details about his role overseeing security functions across its plant locations.

Force Motors Limited's Board approved a modification to its Insider Trading Code, with the updated policy now available on its website. The announcement was made in compliance with SEBI regulations during their board meeting held on April 25, 2025.

Force Motors Limited reported strong financial results for FY 2024-25, with a net profit of approximately Rs. 80,000 lakhs and a dividend of Rs. 40 per share, supported by increased revenue and profit margins. The company also received an unmodified audit opinion, indicating healthy financial health.

Force Motors Limited announced its audited financial results for FY 2024-25, reporting a net profit of approximately Rs. 80 crore and recommending a dividend of Rs. 40 per share. The company showed significant growth in revenue and profit compared to the previous year, with a strong financial position confirmed by unmodified auditor opinions.
